artist: Delineator: Thomas Hearne; Engraver: Francesco Bartolozzi; Publisher: John Thane
description: portrait bust of man turend left; in profile; wearing soft cap; oval composition
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

around oval and below image in black: T. Hearne F.S.A. advivium del.1790  F.Bartolozzi R.A. Sculp 1795 / WILLIAM WOOLLET, / ENGRAVER / London pub. April 30 1795 by J Thane, Spur Street Leicester Square
title: William Woollet, Engraver
